channel.title: Portland, OR Weather from Weather Underground
channel.description: Weather Underground RSS Feed for Portland, OR US

item.title: Current Conditions - 39.9F / 4.4C | Light Rain - 5:26 PM PST Dec. 1
item.description: Temperature: 39.9°F / 4.4°C | Humidity: 89% | Pressure: 29.60in / 1002.3hPa | Conditions: Light Rain | Wind Direction: South | Wind Speed: 8.3mph / 13.4km/h

item.title: Tonight as of Dec. 1 3:15 PM PST
item.description: Tonight - Rain and snow in the evening...then rain after midnight. Breezy. Snow level 1200 feet in the evening. Snow accumulation up to 1 to 3 inches mainly above 500 to 1000 feet near The Gorge. Lows around 35. Southeast wind 15 to 25 mph.

item.title: Sunday as of Dec. 1 3:15 PM PST
item.description: Sunday - Rain...windy. Not as cool. Snow level 1200 feet in the morning. Light snow accumulation. Highs 45 to 50. South wind increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Gusts to 50 mph in the afternoon.

item.title: Sunday Night as of Dec. 1 3:15 PM PST
item.description: Sunday Night - Rain...windy. Lows around 45. Southeast wind 15 to 30 mph.

item.title: Snow Advisory - Expires: 8:00 PM PST
item.description: Snow Advisory for Clackamas County in effect until 8:00 PM PST on December 01, 2007

item.title: Wind Advisory - Expires: 10:00 PM PST
item.description: Wind Advisory for Clackamas County in effect until 10:00 PM PST on December 03, 2007
